item.title: Marshmello & Bastille - Happier - Key of Dm - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Happier by Marshmello & Bastille from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Dm, F.

item.title: Marshmello & Bastille - Happier - Key of Em - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Happier by Marshmello & Bastille from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, Cmaj7, D, Em, G.

item.title: Marshmello & Bastille - Happier - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Em - ukeplayalongs

item.title: Bastille - Pompeii - Key of G - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Pompeii by Bastille from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.
